SwitchPreference.android:title: Disable Hinge Gap
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable the hinge gap for Surface Duo. Requires a reboot

SwitchPreference.android:title: Enable Surface Slim Pen Wireless Charging
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allows pen charging when pen case is attached. May drain more battery.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Charge Pen only when device is plugged in.
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Only charges pen when the device is plugged in. When unplugged, the pen will stop charging. Overrides the previous option.
